entry.title: A Flower Made Of Iron
entry.summary:
Author: XOLissy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 851,917Chapters: 31/?Kudos: 47

Summary: Are you living or just surviving? Eden Parker was just your average human boy. The type who goes to school and steers clear of trouble. That is, until hidden memories are awakened and secrets are revealed. Follow Eden on his rocky journey through the supernatural world, finding his soulmates, and the return of his long lost older brother. Disclaimer: I do not own the Vampire Diaries, Supernatural, Teen Wolf, Smallville, or The Originals. I do not own any of the characters besides Eden Parker and Ben Monroe. All rights reserved to the writers.

entry.title: Demon on His Shoulders
entry.summary:
Author: Mekanamin02

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,002Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 104

Summary: Loner demon lord, Derek Hale just wants a quiet day to himself. One day, is all he asks. But one moment he's at home and the next he's standing in front of a frail old lady jumping to make a demon deal with him. He REALLY doesn't want to accept the deal but... circumstances. So now he's inserting himself into the life of a certain Stiles Stilinski to play his part but perhaps this will be a deal of Derek's millennia-long existence that he will never forget.~*~An unstoppable scream wrenches its way out of the demon as the feeling overpowers every sense in his body. He knows he’s gripping the woman’s arm too tightly, but he can’t seem to care when it feels like his core is igniting from within.Somewhere on the other side of the county, a boy gasps awake beside a hospital bed. There’s beeping behind him, loud, counting down. He sighs and stands, rolls his heavy shoulders and got to work, not realising he has a demon riding on his shoulders now. A demon his grandmother traded her life to protect him.

entry.title: Of A Butterfly's Wings
entry.summary:
Author: Mikaelsonbich25

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 125,647Chapters: 78/?Kudos: 232

Summary: Klaus had expected to be done with life after sacrificing himself. He was sure that he could finally rest and be done with it. But, much to his dismay, an otherworldly being had other plans, due to finding Klaus as a source of entertainment.In snatching away his desired death, Klaus Mikaelson was reincarnated into another world as a young magic caster named Stiles Stilinski. With no choice but to live, Klaus decides to use this opportunity to take over Beacon Hills and make it his kingdom.And maybe one day, he'll be strong enough to find a way back home to his world.

entry.title: Run Boy Run
entry.summary:
Author: myswordhandissinging

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,934Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 653

Summary: Stiles Stilinski knew he should have stayed in to finish his assignment that was due on Monday. Instead, he had to go investigate with the pack. He knew he was going to regret it later, and he probably should have listened to his instincts. When he goes missing, the pack finds him in the same spot after days of searching.   Or the one where Stiles goes missing for a couple of days and comes back blind and with magical powers. What did that bitch do to him?   *This was first published in 2013 as a teenager. Now, as an adult with a developed frontal lobe, the age difference between Derek and Stiles is only 2 years, with Stiles as an 18-year-old high school senior and Derek being 20-years-old.

entry.title: Kingdom of the Chimera
entry.summary:
Author: cry_silver

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,818Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 18

Summary: The war between Nemeton and Gévaudan has ended but with great cost. The now conquering King Theo has retruned from plundering the villages for fresh meat to serve the palace, and more importantly himself. Stiles was ripped away from his simple but content life in Beacon Hills to serve as Theo's most recent obession. Seeing how ruthless the man was during his last obession & the fall out from the resulting war - Stiles struggles to not only survive the the man but also protects the few friends he has within the castle. Which would admittedly be a lot easier if the god damn annoying engima of a man, Lord Hale did not have to go around looking like addonis rencarted.

entry.title: Full Moons and Family Drama
entry.summary:
Author: thenerdyindividual

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,977Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 368

Summary: Talia Hale survives the Hale Fire, along with Laura, Derek, Peter, and Cora. It's been roughly ten years since the events of that night, and to say that it left scars would be an understatement. Desperate to bring her Pack back to its old strength, Talia will not stop pushing her children and brother to settle down and have kids of their own. For this year's Cold Moon, Peter finally brings someone home. Stiles is not at all what Talia was expecting. He's far too young for Peter, he's human, and worst of all a man. (No biological children to carry on the Pack). He also doesn't give a shit what Talia says about him. His mere presence is enough to have her melting down, and it's bad for the simmering tension between her and the rest of the Pack. Unfortunately, everyone else likes him. Derek might like him more than the rest. A little too much. Aw hell, he has a crush on his uncle's boyfriend. But maybe that's okay, because there is something off about Peter and Stiles that Derek just can't quite put his finger on. Or: Five times Peter brought Stiles to a Full Moon Run to mess with Talia + One time Derek did brought Stiles to a Full Moon Run for real.

entry.title: teach me to love just to let me go
entry.summary:
Author: stxrsum

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,648Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 2

Summary: In the shadowed underbelly of Beacon Hills, Stiles Stilinski grapples with the scars of loss and the pull of unspoken desires. When Derek Hale returns from exile, their fragile alliance reignites old flames. As supernatural threats loom, Stiles teaches Derek the vulnerability of love, only to face the agony of being pushed away. Can love endure when it's built on letting go?

entry.title: sanity in my epiphany
entry.summary:
Author: sterekdiva

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,051Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 71

Summary: Derek is standing now —but when Stiles takes a step toward him, instinctive and unthinking, Derek steps back. It’s subtle, but unmistakable. Stiles stops immediately. The hurt hits fast and sharp, but he swallows it down, nodding once to himself. “Sorry,” Stiles tries. “You don’t—” He trails off, shakes his head. “It’s fine.” It doesn’t sound fine. ⋆.˚ ☾ .⭒˚ Prompt: Second Chances @StilesIsPackMomOfTheHalePack: Derek’s pregnant with Eli
